column7: differential role of human Choline kinase alpha and beta enzyme in lipid metabolism : implication in cancer onset and treatment
background
the kennedy pathway generate phosphocoline and phosphoethanolamine through its two branch .

column6: Choline kinase ( chok ) be the first enzyme of the Kennedy branch of synthesis of phosphocholine , the major component of the plasma membrane .
column7: Choline kinase ( chok ) be the first enzyme of the Kennedy branch of synthesis of phosphocholine , the major component of the plasma membrane .
chok family of protein be compose by chokalpha and chokbeta isoform , the first one with two different variant of splicing .
recently chokalpha have be implicate in the carcinogenic process , since it be over-expressed in a variety of human cancer .
however , no evidence for a role of chokbeta in carcinogenesis have be report .
methodology and principal finding
here we compare the in vitro and in vivo property of chokalpha1 and chokbeta in lipid metabolism , and they potential role in carcinogenesis .
both chokalpha1 and chokbeta show choline and ethanolamine kinase activity when assay in cell extract , though with different affinity for they substrate .
however , they behave differentially when overexpress in whole cell .

whereas chokbeta display a ethanolamine kinase role , chokalpha1 present a dual choline and ethanolamine kinase role , suggest the involvement of each chok isoform in distinct biochemical pathway under in vivo condition .

in addition , while overexpression of chokalpha1 be oncogenic when overexpress in hek293t or mdck cell , chokbeta overexpression be not sufficient to induce in vitro cell transformation nor in vivo tumor growth .
furthermore , a significant upregulation of chokalpha1 mrna level in a panel of breast and lung cancer cell line be find , but no change in chokbeta mrna level be observe .
finally , mn58b , a previously describe potent inhibitor of chok with in vivo antitumoral activity , show more than 20-fold higher efficiency towards chokalpha1 than chokbeta .
conclusion and significance
this study represent the first evidence of the distinct metabolic role of chokalpha and chokbeta isoform , suggest different physiological role and implication in human carcinogenesis .
these finding constitute a step forward in the design of a antitumoral strategy base on chok inhibition .
introduction
human choline kinase alpha ( chokalpha ) and beta ( chokbeta ) be member of the choline kinase family .

in mammal this family be encode by two separate gene , chka and chkb , result in three different protein with a choline and ethanolamine kinase ( chok and etnk ) domain : chokalpha1 ( np_001268 ) , chokalpha2 ( np_997634 ) and chokbeta1 ( np_005189 ) .
chokalpha1 differ from chokalpha2 in only a extra stretch of 18 amino acid , while chokbeta differ from chokalpha1 and chokalpha2 in approximately 40 % .

this constitute the first step in the biosynthesis pathway of phosphatidylcholine ( pc ) .
pc be the major phospholipid in eukaryotic membrane and play a critical role in membrane structure and also in cell signalling .

thus , the alpha and alpha homodimer be the most active choline kinase form , the beta and beta homodimer the less active , and the alpha and beta heterodimer have a intermediate phenotype .

the implication of chokalpha in cell growth , proliferation , initiation and progression of cancer be well document .
chokalpha be overexpress in some of the most common cancer , such as breast , lung , colorectal , prostate - and bladder ( unpublished observation ) .
furthermore , it have oncogenic activity when overexpress in human cell .
increase chokalpha mrna level have be recently describe as a independent prognostic marker in non small cell lung cancer patient .
also , human breast cancer cell line show upregulation of chokalpha but not chokbeta , when compare with normal mammary epithelial cell .

in that sense , it have be recently report that in the prostate tumor mouse model ( tramp ) , use ihq immunodetection of chokbeta , a low level expression of chokbeta be find in tumoral sample compare with wild type tissue .
the implication of member of the rho gtpase family in cancer onset and progression have be extensively describe - .
evidence that ChoK be involve in malignant transformation along with ra and rhoa have be provide , , .
moreover , the activity of chokalpha be modulate by known effector of both ra and rhoa , .
pharmacological inhibition of chokalpha have be propose as a novel antitumoral strategy .

a strong support to this strategy be base on the use of mn58b , a well characterize chokalpha inhibitor , which display a potent antiproliferative effect in several tumoral cell line in vitro , and a strong reduction of tumor growth in nude mouse xenograft , - .

we have compare the biochemical and biological property of chokalpha and chokbeta , and demonstrate that besides they homology , the latter be not able to induce cell transformation in hek293t or mdck cell .
moreover , we suggest differential behaviour between alpha and beta isoform in phospholipid metabolism .
finally , the antitumoral property of mn58b can be attribute to its specific inhibition of chokalpha .

the implication of chokalpha in human carcinogenesis have be use for the design of specific inhibitor of this enzyme as a novel anticancer strategy , , .
mn58b be the lead compound to support this novel strategy since it have show a potent antitumoral activity under in vivo condition versus human colon , lung , breast and bladder tumor model , .
the primary structure of mammalian chokbeta display a overall 60 % homology with that of chokalpha1 .
the higher degree of homology lie within the choline and ethanolamine kinase domain .
this homology could make it susceptible to a similar inhibition for both chokalpha1 and chokbeta with the same inhibitor .

thus , we have investigate the specificity of mn58b towards these two chok isoenzyme in order to verify if its antitumoral effect be specifically related to the inhibition of the alpha isoform , that be the one implicate in tumor progression , or the drug similarly affect both isoform .
use the human chokalpha1 and chokbeta recombinant protein , we perform a in vitro chok activity inhibition assay use increase mn58b concentration , determine the ic50 for each enzyme .

discussion
the family of human choline and ethanolamine kinase comprise two gene , chka and chkb that codify for three enzyme , chokalpha1 ( 52 kda ) , chokalpha2 ( 50 kda ) and chokbeta1 ( 45 kda ) .
chokalpha1 and chokalpha2 be almost identical , except for a stretch of 18 extra amino acid in chokalpha1 , as they result from differential splicing from the same gene , chka .

while the implication of chokalpha1 in the regulation of cell growth and cancer have be extensively demonstrate , , , , , , , preliminary evidence suggest that chokbeta may not be involve in carcinogenesis since it be not overexpress in breast cancer cell line nor in the tramp mouse prostate cancer model .
a distinct human gene family have be describe that codify for etnk activity , suggest that etnk1 be the main enzyme involve in pe homeostasis .

the chok and etnk domain confer to chokalpha and chokbeta the ability to function as both chok and etnk activity under cell-free condition , - , but it be still unknown if these previously characterize enzyme show any selectivity to each branch of the kennedy pathway in the de novo synthesis of pc or pe .
it have be recently describe the different specificity towards Cho and Etn of the two isoform of Cho and etnk of tripanosoma brucei .
whereas tbcho and etn1 display only etnk activity , tbcho and etn2 display both chok and etnk activity in vitro .
these result be in keep with those describe for murine etnk1 that be etn specific and etnk2 that display a dual chok and etnk function , .

column7: on the other hand , whereas murine pcyt1alpha and pcyt1beta be involve in pc biosynthesis , pcyt2 be focus to pe only .

column6: however , it be not yet fully understand which ChoK isoform , if any , contribute in vivo in each pathway to maintain the normal homeostasis of both pc and pe in biological membrane .
column7: however , it be not yet fully understand which ChoK isoform , if any , contribute in vivo in each pathway to maintain the normal homeostasis of both pc and pe in biological membrane .

column7: the result show here confirm that both enzyme have the ability to phosphorylate choline and ethanolamine under cell-free condition , either as recombinant protein produce in e. coli , or in cell extract from mammalian cell .

column7: however , we find that under whole cell condition chokalpha1 have the ability to function as both chok and etnk , but ChoKbeta only affect the production of petn .
these finding of different role for alpha and beta isoform be in keep with the information from the recently generate Knock out ( ko ) mouse for chokalpha and chokbeta gene , .
thus , chokbeta ko mouse ( rmd mouse ) be viable , but develop a rostrocaudal muscular dystrophy , while normal pc lipid level be find in most tissue analyze except in hindlimb skeletal muscle .
therefore , chokalpha be sufficient to maintain normal pc level in most tissue .

these result suggest different role in vivo for both chokalpha and chokbeta isoform .

in keep with this , magnetic resonance spectroscopy technique have reveal higher level of phosphomonoesther in tumoral sample when compare to they normal counterpart - .
moreover , overexpression of chokalpha1 be oncogenic , and enhance chokalpha activity be a frequent feature in tumoral sample compare to normal tissue , .

however the latter effect by itself be not sufficient to induce cell transformation , since overexpression of chokbeta do not induce enhance colony formation in soft-agar or tumor growth in nude mouse .

these result be consistent with the hypothesis that it be the production of pcho what be link to cell proliferation and transformation mediate by chok , and that the production of petn may not be sufficient or relevant in this process .
the above result suggest that the two chok isoform investigate , besides they similarity in they primary sequence , be implicate in different metabolic pathway .

column6: chokalpha1 overexpression produce elevated level of both pcho and petn , while similar chokbeta overexpression result only in higher level of petn
column7: however , since in the human hek293t , sk-br-3 and h1299 cell line , chokalpha1 overexpression produce elevated level of both pcho and petn , while similar chokbeta overexpression result only in higher level of petn but normal level of pcho , we can not rule out the possibility that cell transformation require both chok and etnk activity .

consistent with the idea that link oncogenic activity to the function of chokalpha , but not chokbeta , the antiproliferative and antitumoral activity of mn58b be only associate to the activity of chokalpha .
furthermore , as previously report , the in vivo treatment with mn58b result in a specific decrease of pcho level in the tumour but no significant effect on the level of petn .
previous result from we group have demonstrate that mn58b also inhibit choline transport .

however this effect have a little influence in the antiproliferative and antitumoral activity of the drug since hc-3 , a much more potent inhibitor of choline transporter , be far less potent as a antiproliferative agent than mn58b .
furthermore , mn58b have a differential effect on either normal or tumor cell , a strong demonstration of a differential activity due to chok inhibition - .
these result be also in keep with the observation that chokalpha but not chokbeta be a downstream target of oncogenic molecule such as ra and rhoa .
thus , while ra activate chokalpha through ral-gd and pi3k , and rhoa activate chokalpha through rock , none of these oncogenic gtpase affect chokbeta activity under similar condition .

again , these result indicate that although both chok enzyme be able to phosphorylate both choline and ethanolamine under cell-free system condition , they display different affinity for these substrate , and in whole-cell assay condition they be govern by distinct regulatory pathway .
finally , the involvement of chokbeta in breast and lung cancer have be study , chokalpha and beta mrna level be determine by q-pcr .
all tumour derive cell line assay significantly overexpress chokalpha mrna , while no change be find in the expression of chokbeta .
similar result have be recently report , use semi-quantitative pcr in breast cancer cell line .
in addition , it have be recently describe that elevated mrna level of chokalpha be a poor prognostic factor in lung cancer .
these result suggest that chokalpha but not chokbeta be play a crucial role in human carcinogenesis .
the result show here suggest that chokbeta and its produce metabolite be not implicate in human cell transformation .
therefore , all the effort aim at dilucidate the involvement of chok activity in the diagnosis , prognosis and treatment of cancer have to be focus in the chokalpha isoform .
in keep with this , recently the use of specific monoclonal anti-chokalpha antibody have be propose as a diagnostic tool in human cancer .
furthermore , the newly design antitumoral agent be expect to be more specific and hence less toxic than the actual drug use in conventional chemotherapy .

due to the high structural homology display by both choline kinase protein , the search for new anticancer agent base on they ability to interfere with chok activity , must exhibit stronger antiproliferative activity base on they specificity towards the chokalpha isoform .

the lack of specific inhibition of chokbeta by these newly design compound represent a new feature to take into account for the chemical improvement of chokalpha inhibitor with potential antitumoral activity .
furthermore , non specific drug affect chokbeta may result in a muscular disease produce by the lack of cell membrane lipid reparation in muscle tissue .

in addition , it have be recently demonstrate use a genetic approach that the specific inhibition of chokalpha by shrna display antiproliferative and antitumoral activity the high specificity of this technology provide definitive evidence of a antitumoral strategy base on chokalpha inhibition , support previous result with the pharmacological inhibitor .

thus , despite the high homology and similar activity display under cell-free condition , chokalpha1 and chokbeta isoform show a different substrate ability and behave very differently under in vivo condition , suggest that in human cell , chokbeta behave as a etnk and its overexpression be not able to induce higher intracellular level of pcho .
as a consequence , chokbeta have no effect on cell proliferation and do not contribute to oncogenic transformation .
finally , chokalpha but not chokbeta , should be use as the molecular target for the design of anticancer drug aim at interfere with choline kinase acitivity .
Materials and method
ethic statement
all animal be handle in strict accordance with good animal practice as define by the guideline of the spanish government ( rd 223 and 1988 , March 14th and rd 1201 and 2005 October 10th ) .

the animal work have be conduct under the permission and supervision of the Consejo Superior de Investigaciones Cientificas ( CSIC ) Ethic Committee as approve in the context of the appropriate Research Project .
cell culture and transfection
cell be maintain under standard culture condition of humidity ( 95 % ) , temperature ( 37degreesc ) and co2 ( 5 % ) .

human embryonic kidney ( hek293t ) , human breast adenocarcinoma ( sk-br-3 ) and canine kidney madin-darby ( mdck ) cell be maintain in DMEM supplement with 10 % fb , human non small cell lung cancer cell h1299 be maintain in rpmus with 10 % fb .
hek293t transfection be perform use calcium phosphate as previously describe .
MDCK , sk-br-3 and h1299 cell be transfect use lipofectamine reagent ( Invitrogen , CA ) follow manufacturer recommendation .

eukaryotic expression vector encode for human chokalpha1 and beta1 isoform be pcdna3b ( Invitrogen , CA ) and pLPneo ( BD Biosciences Clontech , CA ) respectively , both empty vector be use as control but only pcdna3b be usually represent ( datum not show ) .
constitutively activate expression pcdna3b derivative vector encode for rhoa ( QL ) , rac1 ( QL ) and cdc42 ( QL ) have be previously describe .
expression vector encode to the constitutive active form of h-ras ( v12 ) have be previously describe .
choline kinase in vitro activity assay
eukaryotic cell extract activity assay be carry out as previously describe .

cell extract be incubate for 30 min at 37degreesc in a buffer contain 100 mm Tris ph 8 , 10 mm mgcl2 and 10 mm atp and 200 microm ( 55 mci and nmol , 2 microcus and ml ) of [ methyl-14c ] choline chloride ( Amersham Biosciences , UK ) for chok assay or 2 - [ 14c ] - ethan-1-ol-2-amine hydrochloride for etnk assay ( Amersham Biosciences ) .
for michaelis-menten kinetics assay , extract of e. coli express human chokalpha1 or chokbeta1 be use .
a time course reaction be perform for each substrate , the reaction be stop each 2 minute and a logarithmic scale be represent to obtain the km .
specific chok inhibitor mn58b be kindly provide by TCD Pharma SL ( Madrid , Spain ) .
analysis of phosphocholine and phosphoethanolamine production in whole cell
hek293t , sk-br-3 and h1299 cell be transfect as describe above .

after transfection , cell be label to equilibrium add 1 microcus and ml [ methyl-14c ] choline chloride or 1 microcus and ml 2 - [ 14c ] - ethan-1-ol-2-amine hydrochloride to the culture media for 24 h. sample be resolve and quantify as previously describe .
briefly , cell be rinse with PBS and fix with 16 % ice-cold trichloroacetic acid ( TCA ) .
tca-soluble material contain choline and phosphocholine be wash three time with four volume of diethyleter , drye under vacuum and resuspend in water .
sample be resolve by Thin Layer chromatography ( tlc ) on 60A Silica gel plate ( Whatman , NJ ) , use as liquid phase 0,9 % nacl : methanol : ammonium hydroxide ( 50:70:5 ; v/v/v ) .
radioactivity be automatically quantify by a electronic radiography system ( Instantimager , CT ) .
TCA insoluble material contain hydrophobic lipid be use as a load control .
the insoluble fraction be dissolve in 0,25 n sodium hydroxide and total lipid be analyze by scintillation counting .
anti-choline kinase beta1 serum
human chokbeta1 gene be clone into a prokaryotic expression vector ( pgex-4t3 ) ( GE healthcare , UK ) and express in dh5alpha escherichia coli .
recombinant chokbeta1 be then purify by the gst system ( Amersham Bioscience ) follow manufacturer 's recommendation .
purify chokbeta1 be mixed ( 1:1 ; v and v ) with Freund 's complete adjuvant ( Sigma-Aldrich , MO ) and then inject i.m. into white rabbit ( 80 microg and rabbit ) .
Booster injection be give every 2 week ( 60 microg and rabbit ) and the sample resuspend with freund 's incomplete adjuvant ( Sigma-Aldrich ) ( 1:1 ; v and v ) .
analysis of protein expression by western blot
Equal amount of cell lysate be resolve by electrophoresis in a 10 % sds-page .
chokalpha expression level be detect use monoclonal antibody ad3 as previously describe .
chokbeta1 be detect use the polyclonal antiserum describe above as primary antibody at a standard dilution of 1 and 5000 .

gtpase antibody : rhoa ( Santa Cruz Biotechnology , Germany ) , rac1 ( Upstate , NY ) , pan-ras ( Santa Cruz Biotechnology ) , cdc42 ( BD Biosciences , transduction lab ) and gapdh antibody ( Chemicon International , CA ) be use follow manufacturer recommendation .
HRP conjugate secondary antibody be from Santa Cruz Biotechnology .
the specific binding be detect use the chemioluminiscence detection kit ecl ( Amersham Bioscience ) follow the manufacturer indication .
soft agar anchorage independent growth and in vivo tumorigenic assay
Anchorage independent growth assay be perform at 5-6 week of incubation in hek293t and 6-10 week in mdck , as previously describe , plate 105 cell per 60-mm dish .
Crystal violet staining be perform to enhance colony contrast .
the number of colony be automatically quantify by computer base image software ( image j ) .
for the in vivo assay , cell be inject ( 106 cell per mouse flank ) s.c. in nu and nu athymic mouse .
mouse be keep under standard laboratory condition accord to the guideline of spanish government .
quantitative pcr
chokalpha1 or beta1 mrna level be quantify by real-time reverse transcriptase pcr .
the rna be extract from the cell line use qiashredder follow the RNeasy Mini kit ( Qiagen , Inc. ) accord to the manufacturer 's instruction .

the amount of 0.9 microg of total rna , in a final concentration of 10 ng and microl per reaction , be retro transcribe by High-Capacity cdna Archive kit ( Applied Biosystems ) to the cdna preparation .

the reverse transcription condition be 25degreesc for 10 min and 37degreesc for 2 h. then , each cdna sample be analyze in triplicate use the ABI PRISM 7700 sequence detector ( PE Applied Biosystems ) .
real-time pcr be carry out use Taqman Universal pcr master Mix ( Applied Biosystems ) , contain rox to normalize emission .

primer use for amplification of chokalpha , chokbeta and 18 ribosomal rna be purchase from Applied Biosystems as Taqman Gene expression assay ( chokalpha1 id : hs00608045_m1 , chokbeta1 id : hs01925200_s1 and 18 ribosomal rna id : hs99999901_s1 ) .
for thermal cycling , the following condition be apply : 10 min at 95degreesc and 40 cycle of 15 sec at 95degreesc and 1 min at 60degreesc .
the datum be present as log10 rq ( relative quantity ) .
statistical analysis
mean comparison of chok activity or in-cell pcho increase between different group be perform .
continuous variable with normal distribution be compare by t-test and non normal distribution variable be compare by means of the Kruskal Wallis and Mann-Whitney U test .
statistical significance be define as p < = 0.05 .
the statistical analysis be perform use SPSS software , version 13.0 ( Inc , Chicago , Illinois ) .

the method use to analyze datum from real-time pcr experiment be 2-deltadeltact method , compare the relative gene expression between normal and tumoral cell line normalize to 18S ribosomal rna as endogenous reference gene .
